channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2023100024
item.description:
Report X-2023100024

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-06T09:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO THE UNLOAD DOOR 14. RESPONDER ARRIVED WEARING FULL PPE TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER FOLLWED DECISION TREE, CONTAINED THE SPILL, AND BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023090016
item.description:
Report X-2023090016

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-03T00:35:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-09
  • City: LAS VEGAS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: After inspection of TILX 192936, the vacuum relief valve was found to be releasing vapor. The cause of the valve failure could not be identified, the vacuum relief valve was removed and a plug installed, stopping the release.
